production rate is reached. Phosphorus is a scarce finite resource on earth and
due to its non-gaseous environmental cycle has resulted in alternative means of
production other than mining being unavailable. According to some
researchers, Earth's phosphorus reserves are expected to be completely depleted

2030. Whereas in stark contrast the International
